reasons: Your beauty is unquantifiable
You drive me to become the best I can be
Your smile is like light to everyone who sees it
You are compassionate
You are completely honest
Your intelligence is beautiful
Your joy is contagious
You are strong
I love to see you laugh
Your happiness makes me happy
I love the sound of your voice
I love listening to you
I love you in your joy
I love you in your sadness
I love you in your anger
I love you in your disappointment
I love you in your success
I love you in your failure
I love your elegance
I love your shine
I love the potential within you and want to see it manifest
I love your patience
I love your eyes and always want to look into them
Who wouldn't love you?

body: You are my best part and my best friend.
I love you endlessly, and you I love that we will spend life together.
could think of no better reason to celebrate Valentine’s Day, than you.
